name: HarrahsReservationForm
short_description: Customers can come on this site to reserve a day trip to Harrah's Casion in Cherokee, NC.  The customer will input Name, Address, Phone number, email address, and total number in party, along with the names of each person in the party.  The customer will be asked to make a  $25 deposit, per person, who are going on the trip.  The trip costs $50 per person, for the day.  Cancellation of the trip can only be done through this website.  Refunds will be 100% of the total amount paid per person.  Refunds will be credited back to the Bank Debit/Credit card that was used to make the reservation. if the customer purchased our Trip Cancellation Insurance for $10.00 at the time the trip was reserved.  No refunds will be done for cancellations within 14 days of the trip.  Owners of Georgia Receptive Tours have the right to
summary: Make a reservation for day trip to Harrah's Cherokee, NC
